nodes.text: Around 3641 BBY, the Trandoshan Qyzen Fess issued a ghrajath to the traitorous Trandoshan Veneb Drassk. Accompanied by the Barsen'thor, Fess confronted Drassk and his clanmates on Taris and killed the traitor. After Drassk's death, the rest of his clan chose to follow Fess, resulting in Fess becoming the new leader of Drassk's clan.
